---
title: Quarto parametrized template for R
format: typst
params:
   color: blue
---

```{=typst}
// behavior for Typst report
#set page(fill: `r params$color`)
```

```{=html}
<!-- behavior for HTML report -->
<style>
   body {
      background-color: `r params$color`
   }
</style>
```

```{r}
print(paste0("color is: ", params$color))
```
